text: The Uruguay national under-17 football team represents Uruguay in youth international football. They have qualified for the FIFA U-17 World Cup six titles with their best placing being runners-up at the 2011 tournament. == Competitive record == === FIFA U-17 World Cup === FIFA U-17 World Cup
